mapper.select: SELECT M.articleId,M.BRIEF,M.TITLE,M.DAYS,M.CATEGORY,M.SUMMARY,M.READCOUNT FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM,I.articleId,I.BRIEF,I.TITLE,I.DAYS,I.CATEGORY,I.SUMMARY,I.READCOUNT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) R,(SELECT T.ARTICLE_ID AS articleId, T.BRIEF, T.TITLE, TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(T.CREATE_TIME) AS DAYS, T.CATEGORY, T.SUMMARY, T.READ_COUNT AS READCOUNT FROM ARTICLE T ORDER BY T.CREATE_TIME DESC ) I )M WHERE M.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{begin,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{end,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT M.articleId,M.BRIEF,M.TITLE,M.DAYS,M.CATEGORY,M.SUMMARY,M.READCOUNT FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM,I.articleId,I.BRIEF,I.TITLE,I.DAYS,I.CATEGORY,I.SUMMARY,I.READCOUNT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) R,(SELECT T.ARTICLE_ID AS articleId, T.BRIEF, T.TITLE, TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(T.CREATE_TIME) AS DAYS, T.CATEGORY, T.SUMMARY, T.READ_COUNT AS READCOUNT FROM ARTICLE T ORDER BY T.CREATE_TIME DESC ) I )M WHERE M.ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 AND #{showBlock,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT I.articleId,I.TITLE,I.READCOUNT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM, M.articleId, M.TITLE, M.READCOUNT FROM(SELECT @rownum:=0) R,(SELECT T.ARTICLE_ID AS articleId, T.TITLE, T.READ_COUNT AS READCOUNT FROM ARTICLE T WHERE T.CATEGORY=#{cateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY T.CREATE_TIME DESC) M ) I WHERE I.ROWNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 5
SELECT T.ARTICLE_ID AS articleId, T.BRIEF, T.TITLE, T.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, T.CATEGORY, T.SUMMARY, T.READ_COUNT AS READCOUNT FROM ARTICLE T WHERE T.ARTICLE_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT I.articleId, I.TITLE, I.BRIEF, I.DAYS, I.CATEGORY, I.SUMMARY, I.READCOUNT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM, M.articleId, M.TITLE, M.BRIEF, M.DAYS, M.CATEGORY, M.SUMMARY, M.READCOUNT FROM(SELECT @rownum:=0) R,(SELECT T.ARTICLE_ID AS articleId, T.BRIEF, T.TITLE, TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(T.CREATE_TIME) AS DAYS, T.CATEGORY, T.SUMMARY, T.READ_COUNT AS READCOUNT FROM ARTICLE T WHERE T.CATEGORY=#{cateType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY T.CREATE_TIME DESC) M ) I WHERE I.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{begin,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{end,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO ARTICLE ( ARTICLE_ID, TITLE, BRIEF, CREATE_TIME, CATEGORY, SUMMARY, READ_COUNT ) VALUES ( #{article.articleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{article.title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{article.brief,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{article.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{article.category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{article.summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{article.readCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: SELECT T.ARTICLE_ID AS articleId, T.BRIEF, T.TITLE, T.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, T.CATEGORY, T.SUMMARY, T.READ_COUNT AS READCOUNT FROM ARTICLE T WHERE T.TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT I.articleId, I.TITLE, I.BRIEF, I.DAYS, I.CATEGORY, I.SUMMARY, I.READCOUNT FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS ROWNUM, M.articleId, M.TITLE, M.BRIEF, M.DAYS, M.CATEGORY, M.SUMMARY, M.READCOUNT FROM(SELECT @rownum:=0) R,(SELECT T.ARTICLE_ID AS articleId, T.BRIEF, T.TITLE, TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(T.CREATE_TIME) AS DAYS, T.CATEGORY, T.SUMMARY, T.READ_COUNT AS READCOUNT FROM ARTICLE T INNER JOIN (SELECT T1.ARTICLE_ID FROM ARTICLE_LABEL T1 WHERE T1.LABEL=#{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AL ON T.ARTICLE_ID = AL.ARTICLE_ID ORDER BY T.CREATE_TIME DESC) M ) I WHERE I.ROWNUM BETWEEN #{begin,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{end,jdbcType=INTEGER}
